consumer intelligence content mastering and delivery and morebrbrstrongThe JobbrbrstrongWarnerMedia Entertainment Inc seeks a Sr Data Scientist for the Emerging amp Creative Technologies team The Data Scientist will be responsible for developing and maintaining machine learning algorithms which correlate neurological states with audio visual content for a consumer facing ML based Neurotechnology platform This position will be responsible for the integrity and effectiveness of the ML algorithms and databases that power these platforms This position also assists with AIML research and development in realtime interactive Mixed Reality applications utilizing Computer Vision Speech Natural Language Processing AIbased cognitive framework and physicbased motion simulationsbrbrstrongThe
